price: Sonunda İbrahim onları paramparça etti. Yalnız onların büyüğünü bıraktı; belki ona müracaat ederler diye.
arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalahum judhādhan illā kabīran lahum laʿallahum ilayhi yarjiʿūna
